long_description: As top performing snowboard boots from Vans, the Aura boots feature classic Vans styling, a forgiving flex, articulated cuffs and the Double Boa(R) lacing system for a dialed fit. Vans Double Boa(R) lacing features 2 fit zones that tighten independently; they tighten over the instep and hold the heel securely no matter how tight the upper is cranked. TriFit-X thermal liners feature asymmetric X-Cage inserts that lock your heels in place; low-volume soles help you feel connected to the board. Fleece-lined upper cuffs offer warmth; flexible toe boxes help the boots feel more like shoes when you're walking or hiking. Cuffs flex easily for enhanced board control when carving; wrap-around design offers a secure closure around your ankles and calves. Instep articulation offers a forgiving forward flex that maintains support. Molded EVA footbeds feature integrated arch support and dual-density metatarsal and heel impact-relief pads. Cushioned rubber outsoles feature an inverted waffle tread patten design for increased traction.
short_description: As top performing snowboard boots from Vans, the Aura boots feature classic Vans styling, a forgiving flex, articulated cuffs and the Double Boa(R) lacing system for a dialed fit.
